sn22.67:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu … pe … ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu … pe … ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan"ti. "Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, dukkhaṁ; tatra te chando pahātabbo"ti. "Aññātaṁ, bhagavā, aññātaṁ, sugatā"ti.
sn22.67:2: "Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī"ti? "Rūpaṁ kho, bhante, dukkhaṁ; tatra me chando pahātabbo. Vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ; tatra me chando pahātabbo. Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī"ti.
sn22.67:3: "Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhu. Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi. Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, dukkhaṁ; tatra te chando pahātabbo. Vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ; tatra te chando pahātabbo. Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo"ti … pe … aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
